data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Češinovo-Obleševo, North Macedonia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Češinovo-Obleševo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 8 believers in Češinovo-Obleševo to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 624 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 8 believers in the state of Češinovo-Obleševo to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Češinovo-Obleševo, North Macedonia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, please defend the 8 believers in Češinovo-Obleševo against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Češinovo-Obleševo access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Češinovo-Obleševo, North Macedonia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
